title: Superhamiltonian formalism for $2D$ $N=1,2$ theories
abstract: We show how to formulate $2$-dimensional supersymmetric $N=1,2$ theories, both massive and conformal, within a manifestly supersymmetric hamiltonian framework, via the introduction of a (super)-Poisson brackets structure defined on superfields. In this approach, as distinct from the previously known superfield hamiltonian formulations, the dynamics is not separated into two unrelated $2D$ light-cone superspaces, but is recovered by specifying boundary conditions at a given ``super-time" coordinate. So the approach proposed provides a natural generalization of canonical hamiltonian formalism. One of its interesting features is that the physical and auxiliary fields equations appear on equal footing as the Hamilton ones.
